abstract: The automaker features vintage photographs of vintage Chevrolets in a commercial that is to be introduced Wednesday night, during the first game of the 2011 World Series.
snippet: The automaker features vintage photographs of vintage Chevrolets in a commercial that is to be introduced Wednesday night, during the first game of the 2011 World Series.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: Our colleagues at the Media Decoder report that Chevrolet is scheduled to air a commercial commemorating the brand's 100th anniversary during Wednesday night's broadcast of the first game of the World Series. The commercial centers on vintage photographs of vintage Chevrolets, which are held up to the camera at the same locations as they appear today. A live recording of Ray Charles performing "America the Beautiful" provides the soundtrack. Read more »

headline.main: Chevy Turns to Pictures to Celebrate a Centennial
